tiles.title: Pricing updates coming soon
tiles.description: On 23 March 2022, Secrets Manager will introduce Standard and Trial pricing plans. The current Lite plan option will be deprecated. To ensure that your service functionality is not disrupted, be sure to upgrade to a Standard plan prior to 22 May 2022. For more information, check the full release notes.

tiles.title: Enable lifecycle notifications for your certificates
tiles.description: To be notified of critical certificate lifecycle events, you can now configure your notification preferences through the Event Notifications service.

tiles.title: Store key-value secrets
tiles.description: You can now use Secrets Manager to store key-value secrets. Check the full release notes for details.
